Over 30 years experience in sourcing and branding the right promotional products for you.

Conveniently based in One Tree Hill, Auckland, Cloudbase Print and Promotions (Cost Effective Corporate Gifts) was founded in 1997. Our customers benefit from our excellent service and 30 years experience supplying custom printed promotional products, printed and embroidered clothing.

Cost Effective Corporate Gifts service clients Auckland wide plus clients in Tauranga, Napier, Wellington, Christchurch and Invercargill. We also supply printed pens to Melbourne and Sydney clients.
